text: Deadpool 2 is a 2018 superhero comedy drama movie based on the Marvel character Deadpool, distributed by 20th Century Fox. It is the eleventh movie of the X-Men Cinematic Universe, the direct sequel of Deadpool (2016) and the second movie of Deadpool franchise. ==Plot== Deadpool made a group named X-Force to save the young mutant Russell from the future mutant soldier Cable that has come from the future to kill him. ==Cast== *Ryan Reynolds as Wade Wilson / Deadpool *Josh Brolin as Nathan Summers / Cable *Zazie Beetz as Neena Thurman / Domino *Morena Baccarin as Vanessa Carlysle *Julian Dennison as Russell Collins / Firefist *T. J. Miller as Weasel *Stefan Kapicic (voice and motion capture face) and Andr√© Tricoteux (motion capture on set) as Pietr Rasputin / Colossus *Brianna Hildebrand as Ellie Phimister / Teenage Mutate Warhead *Shioli Kutsuna as Yukio *Leslie Uggams as Blind Al *Karan Soni as Dopinder *David Leitch (motion capture) and Ryan Reynolds (voice and motion capture face) as Cain Marko / Juggernaut *Eddie Maran as The Headmaster *Terry Crews as Bedlam *Lewis Tan as Shatterstar *Bill Skarsgard as Zeitgeist *Rob Delaney as Peter *Brad Pitt as Vanisher ==Sequel== A sequel titled Deadpool 3 is in development by Marvel. Reynolds, Baccarin and Brolin will play their roles again. ==References== Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American sequel movies Category:2010s action movies Category:2010s black comedy movies Category:2010s sequel movies Category:2010s superhero movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Cancer in movies Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies composed by Tyler Bates Category:Movies produced by Lauren Shuler Donner Category:Movies produced by Simon Kinberg Category:Screenplays by Paul Wernick Category:Screenplays by Rhett Reese Category:Self-reflexive movies Category:Deadpool movies Category:X-Men (movie series) Category:Movies set in 2018 Category:American superhero movies Category:Movies directed by David Leitch
title: Deadpool 2
